DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate effect Mesalamine Amitriptyline drug Quality Life Symptom Severity Scale patient Diarrhea- Predominant Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS-D ) . All patient fill three validate questionnaire ( IBS Symptom Severity Scale ( IBS-SSS ) , Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ) IBS Quality Life ( IBS-QOL ) ) begin trial week 2,4,6 8 treatment . Serum Immune Bio marker measure 0,4 , 8 week treatment . This study clinical trial upon 90 patient Diarrhea- Predominant IBS ( IBS-D ) refer first time private gastrointestinal clinic 2014 2016 . All patient meet inclusion criterion enrol 2-week period screen phase . In order exclude patient Lactose intolerance , patient take lactose-free diet 14 day inclusion patient whose symptom improve regimen exclude . This trial double-blind study patient assign randomly three group : 1 . Mesalazine group : Patients receive Asacol ( 800 mg/TDS ) placebo agent similar Amitriptyline ( 10 mg/HS ) 8 week 2 . Amitriptyline group : Patients receive Amitriptyline ( 10 mg/HS ) placebo like Asacol ( 800 mg/ TDS ) 8 week 3 . Control group ( placebo group ) : Patients receive placebo like Asacol ( 800 mg/TDS ) placebo similar Amitriptyline ( 10 mg/HS ) 8 week Ethical consideration : 1 . All patient fulfill inform consent 2 . Drugs available without charge 3 . Observation Helsinki ethical statement
